sn47.14:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vajjisu viharati ukkacelayam gangaya nadiya tire mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim aciraparinibbutesu sariputtamoggallanesu.
sn47.14:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava bhikkhusanghaparivuto ajjhokase nisinno hoti.
sn47.14:2.1: Atha kho bhagava tunhibhutam bhikkhusangham anuviloketva bhikkhu amantesi:
sn47.14:2.2: “api myayam, bhikkhave, parisa sunna viya khayati parinibbutesu sariputtamoggallanesu.
sn47.14:2.3: Asunna me, bhikkhave, parisa hoti, anapekkha tassam disayam hoti, yassam disayam sariputtamoggallana viharanti.
sn47.14:2.4: Ye hi te, bhikkhave, ahesum atitamaddhanam arahanto sammasambuddha, tesampi bhagavantanam etapparamamyeva savakayugam ahosi—
sn47.14:2.6: Yepi te, bhikkhave, bhavissanti anagatamaddhanam arahanto sammasambuddha, tesampi bhagavantanam etapparamamyeva savakayugam bhavissati—seyyathapi mayham sariputtamoggallana.
sn47.14:2.7: Acchariyam, bhikkhave, savakanam, abbhutam, bhikkhave, savakanam.
sn47.14:2.8: Satthu ca nama sasanakara bhavissanti ovadappatikara, catunnanca parisanam piya bhavissanti manapa garubhavaniya ca.
sn47.14:2.9: Acchariyam, bhikkhave, tathagatassa, abbhutam, bhikkhave, tathagatassa.
sn47.14:2.10: Evarupepi nama savakayuge parinibbute natthi tathagatassa soko va paridevo va.
sn47.14:2.11: Tam kutettha, bhikkhave, labbha. Yam tam jatam bhutam sankhatam palokadhammam, tam vata ma palujjiti—
sn47.14:2.13: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mahato rukkhassa titthato saravato ye mahantatara khandha te palujjeyyum;
sn47.14:2.14: evameva kho, bhikkhave, mahato bhikkhusanghassa titthato saravato sariputtamoggallana parinibbuta.
sn47.14:2.15: Tam kutettha, bhikkhave, labbha. Yam tam jatam bhutam sankhatam palokadhammam, tam vata ma palujjiti—
sn47.14:2.17: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, attadipa viharatha attasarana anannasarana, dhammadipa dhammasarana anannasarana.
sn47.14:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attadipo viharati attasarano anannasarano, dhammadipo dhammasarano anannasarano?
sn47.14:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.14:3.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.14:3.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attadipo viharati attasarano anannasarano, dhammadipo dhammasarano anannasarano.
sn47.14:3.7: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi va mamaccaye va attadipa viharissanti attasarana anannasarana, dhammadipa dhammasarana anannasarana; tamatagge mete, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhavissanti ye keci sikkhakama”ti.
